descriptions.title: An Overview of Jampa Bumling
descriptions.content:
This site consists of three monasteries: an upper monastery, a lower monastery, and a retreat hut in the ravine. In 2011, only the upper monastery was functioning as a Buddhist institution.

 

According to the Chinese history 邓天珍与王亨编著.炳灵寺石窟旅游指南.通炳灵寺文物保管所 (p. 1), this site was originally called "Tang Shu Cave" (ཐང་ཧྲུའུ་བྲག་ཕུག, 唐述窟）.
